summary: Uplifting tale about a man who grows a crop of colored balloons.
cast: Rip Torn|Mara Wilson|Roberts Blossom|Fredric Lehne|Richard Riehle|Ernie Lively|Arnetia Walker|Lee Garlington|Guy Boyd|Neal McDonough|Ken Jenkins|Adam Wylie|RuDee Sade|Laurie Metcalf|Holly Maples|Dean Marsico|Tony Reitano|Claudia Stedelin|Sonya Wolk|Isaac Lipscomb
title: Un golpe de magia
